questions.question: Sensitivity of Capacitance Level Probe can be increased by

answers.b: decreasing the size of the gap (D)
answers.c: either or both of the these

questions.question: Capacitance sensor cannot be used to measure level of

answers.b: materials with large particle sizes exceeding 1/2 in. in diameter

questions.question: The principle of operation used in Capacitive transducers is

answers.c: change of capacitance with change of distance between plates
